Subject: Live Update from 5.6. to 5.7. not possible
Description:
Hello, we want to Update our Endpoint Protector from Version 5.6 to 5.7, however before the Update starts we recieve the error "Database partitions are disabled! Please contact Support for assistance!"

Could you please help us here? How can we Activate the Database partitions?
Solution_Comment__c:
Applied partition offline patch.
Updated to 5.7.0.0.
